sqlQuery.name: EstsByOrganismAbbrev
sqlQuery.sql: select distinct ea.source_id from apidb.Organism o, sres.TaxonName tn, webready.EstAttributes_p ea, ( select ts.taxon_id as representative_taxon_id, ts.species_taxon_id as taxon_id from apidbTuning.TaxonSpecies ts where ts.taxon_id in (select taxon_id from apidb.Organism where is_reference_strain = 1 ) union select uplink.taxon_id as representative_taxon_id, downlink.taxon_id from apidbTuning.TaxonSpecies uplink, apidbTuning.TaxonSpecies downlink where uplink.species_taxon_id = downlink.species_taxon_id and uplink.taxon_id in (select taxon_id from apidb.Organism where is_reference_strain = 1 ) and downlink.taxon_id not in (select taxon_id from apidb.Organism) union select taxon_id as representative_taxon_id, taxon_id from apidb.Organism ) taxmap where o.taxon_id = taxmap.representative_taxon_id and taxmap.taxon_id = tn.taxon_id and tn.name = ea.organism and o.abbrev = $$organismAbbrev$$ and ea.org_abbrev = $$organismAbbrev$$

sqlQuery.name: organismAbbrevs
sqlQuery.sql: select distinct abbrev as internal, abbrev as term from apidb.Organism

sqlQuery.name: Bfmv
sqlQuery.sql: select source_id, dbest_name, vector, stage, organism, '@PROJECT_ID@' as project from webready.EstAttributes_p where org_abbrev in (%%PARTITION_KEYS%%)

sqlQuery.name: EstAlias
sqlQuery.sql: select source_id, source_id as old_source_id from webready.EstAttributes_p where org_abbrev in (%%PARTITION_KEYS%%)

sqlQuery.name: Reference
sqlQuery.sql: select e.accession as source_id, case when (c.name is not null) then c.name else c.last end as author, c.address1 as affiliation from dots.Est e, sres.Contact c, dots.ExternalNaSequence ens, sres.OntologyTerm ot where e.contact_id = c.contact_id and ens.na_sequence_id = e.na_sequence_id and ens.sequence_ontology_id = ot.ontology_term_id and ot.name = 'EST'
